name: Business. The Game.
description:
It's your business, you can cry if you want to.

In Business. The Game. you can play through 2 real-life* scenarios to make some very important business happen.

Will you write your own job listings to find good candidates, or will you just copy and paste something from a competitor that's close enough?

You've sent an email to a client where you've misspelled their name, do you send an apology, or will you pretend nothing happened?

Business. The Game. was created by a real-life* video game CEO entirely in PowerPoint over three days at the Toronto Game Jam (TOJam12).
